subject: Simson X pedals
description_text:
Hello i received the x pro pedals as a gift on the 7th ive been messing
around with them to try and find the right set up for me but im having a
horrible experience with the brake pedal and it being way to stiff from
default

the feel i am going for is more travel it currently feels like a wall using
as mush force as possible to even get it pushed down how can i fix this to
have more travel and feel way less firm

conversations.body_text: Hi Nelson Silva,  You can remove the 10mm spacer inside the black brake spring. This spacer is designed for a shorter travel setup used in F1. Once removed, the spring can fully compress, increasing the travel and making it more suitable for rally racing.
